game.name: New York Jigsaw Puzzle
game.description:
You recently visited the New York City and captured a few images of their major attractions. Some of pictures captured by your advanced camera are really awesome and worth watching. When you returned home, most of them were ripped and scattered in multiple pieces. However, you want to connect them with each other and showcase them to your friends and families.  Join New York Jigsaw Puzzle game and get ready to learn how easier it to arrange the jigsaw pieces together to prepare the popular locations of New York City!

When you click the play button, you will be allowed to select image of the landmark and then the number of pieces each row or column! The major landmarks of the New York City include Downtown Manhattan, Yellow Cabs, Central Park, Brooklyn Bridge, the Empire State Building and more. There are 12 images to play with in this html5 puzzle game. You can keep them in row and column in the ratio 3:3, 4:4 and 4:5. Modify the number of pieces of each row or column anytime you want. 

In case if you are stuck and seek for help, then you can use the hint system zoom function to zoom out. There are multiple backgrounds to select and give you a lovely platform to have fun.  It will be amazing to enjoy the panoramic views and some beautiful shots of the popular World Trade Centers! Use Your logical mind and sharp brain abilities to clear all levels and prove the world that you are the best puzzle solver! The timer will keep running on the top of the screen. Complete puzzle fast to score big in the end of each level!

game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS L CLICK OF MOUSE AND JOIN THE PICES TO COMPLETE THE IMAGE
